data.name: Tower of Waifus 2 - Uncensored (R18)
data.detailed_description: This DLC added a gallery that contains unlocked images and hentai scenes after finishing a level.
data.about_the_game: This DLC added a gallery that contains unlocked images and hentai scenes after finishing a level.
data.short_description: This DLC added a gallery that contains unlocked images and hentai scenes after finishing a level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content.
This base game is not included any nudity content.
All character are over 18 year old.
